Reviews.Title: WRONG PHONE
Reviews.Author: Dez_89
Reviews.Content: Exactly the same happened to me. I ordered the silver one and guess what ... I received the BROWN VERSION . This is so disappointed because if I chose this seller was because they supposed to have the SILVER version...I saw the brown one much cheaper with other sellers...so at the end I paid more money and I get the same cheaper version.A mi me paso lo mismo que a estas personas. Yo ordene la version Silver y me enviaron la de color cafe. Estoy disgustada porque escogi este vendedor solo por que tenia la version plateada a la venta...en otros lugares vi el celular cafe mucho mas barato... al final pague mas dinero (segun yo por la version Silver) y al final recibi el mismo celular cafe el cual yo NO queria.

Reviews.Title: WRONG PHONE
Reviews.Author: DRB
Reviews.Content: I am unhappy in that I have just received the phone and it is the T-Mobile version of the phone. To make matters worse, the phone was not silver but gold instead. Also, the buttons are a bit different from those displayed in the listing.Thankfully I still like the phone.I thought there may have just been a mix up in my order until I saw someone else had recently posted a similar problem wrt it being the T-Mobile version. The listing really needs to be updated to reflect the product accurately. The variations between the the image displayed in the listing and the actual product, whether intentional or not, makes buyers like myself feel a bit cheated.

Reviews.Title: WRONG PHONE!
Reviews.Author: compnerd21
Reviews.Content: Horrible, ive tried ordering this item twice from two different sellers, and i have been sent the t-mobile version twice, DO NOT ORDER THIS ITEM

Reviews.Title: so so smart phone
Reviews.Author: wings
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone. I am so thrilled when the parcel is delivered. Sadly, my excitement is quickly dampened after realizing (though indicated to be in the box) that the SIM card is missing which perforce a trip to a T Mobile Store for its activation. I find the HTC T7373 Touch Pro to be relatively weighty mainly due addition of the qwerty key pad.  It is a neat scheme to put lots of applications on the unit.  Scrolling the window screen reveals unfamiliar names like "Handango in Hand, JETSET Presenter5 and JBlend".  I am befuddled by many applications that I can not even point my finger where to start and what it is for.  But, as a beginner I prefer to download them as they are needed.I have a difficulty in getting the Stereo FM radio to work so I go to a TMobile Store only to be informed that this feature is not supported. I wish it was there because I move around a lot, and I need the radio to keep me entertained and informed.From 1 to 10, 10 being the highest, I shall give it a 4.

Reviews.Title: I sold something diferntes to what the pictures show, el vendedor me engaño
Reviews.Author: Matceni
Reviews.Content: I feel really upset, because both the pictures and the features presented by the seller of the 2 phones, according to the Product Features and Technical Details that showed them in the purchase page to buy cellphones should have FM radio and not have it, you sent me phones in brown, not gray and has no front camera as the photos show.does not seem right that the pictures show one thing and sell another.I am very upset and would not recommend this place to someone else to buy on this siteActually this article is an irresponsible seller, I personally would never buy from this store and would not recommend to do so, the phone is good, but the seller is irresponsible.The phone has no front camera is not silver, is biggerRealmente este articulo este vendedor es un irresponsable, en lo personal no volvería a comprar a esta tienda y no recomendaría que lo hagan, el teléfono es bueno, pero el vendedor es irresponsable.El teléfono no tiene la camara frontal, no es plateado, es mas grande.

Reviews.Title: Be careful about this seller-Firemall LLC
Reviews.Author: Jayakiran Pagadala
Reviews.Content: I tried buying a phone. What they have in stock and what they claim to offer to sell are two different things.Look at a response I got after I received the incorrect color phone."I do apologize for the inconvenience, and I understand your frustration. However, this is the only phone we have in stock therefore we are unable to ship out a different one to you" - which means I am stuck with something I don't like.Why in the first place they have to ship the wrong one?

Reviews.Title: wrong phone
Reviews.Author: Rosdel Balbas "rosdelb"
Reviews.Content: I am very unhappy with this phone, is not the same phone amazon show, after one week working the phone does not work, i can not make calls and the battery work only one hour, do not buy this phone, very bad phone.

Reviews.Title: the equipment that u show in amazon is not the one that u are going
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: The equipment that u show in amazon is not the one that u are going.I'm going to notify amazon to stop the transaction because what u sell is not what u publish at amazon.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone order problems
Reviews.Author: amazon seller
Reviews.Content: Many people are complaining that they keep getting this phone in the T-Mobile version, And that is the only way they make this phone. This phone is for T-Mobile plans only, it clearly shows the T-Mobile logo in the picture. I have tried to sell this phone on amazon for awhile now. I finally just had amazon send it back to me because so many people expect to get a different phone, this phone does not come in silver it states that this phone comes in MOCHA, which is a brown color. I feel as though people who order this phone do NOT look at all the details about this phone close enough, I'm tired of having to pay amazon for shipping because the customer sends the phone back, not because it wasn't good quality just because the customer thought they were going to get a different product entirely. Just to make sure people understand....THIS PHONE IS T-MOBILE ONLY.MOCHA MEANS BROWN NOT SILVER.

Reviews.Title: Don't even bother!
Reviews.Author: Fadkar
Reviews.Content: I've had to survive with this phone for the past 2 years and let me tell you, its HORRIBLE!! the touchscreen is horrible, its fat, heavy, bulky, laggy, and the interface is horrible. this has to be one of the worst phones htc has made! granted that 2 years ago, it was an OK phone, its not worth 500 dollars!! do yourself a favor and buy a high end android phone for that price! this can't get apps and the internet sucks due to the horrible touch screen.

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: Qualcomm MSM7225, 528 MHz; Camera: 3.2 MP; Display: 2.8-inch TFT-LCD touch-sensitive screen; Internal GPS antenna; Bluetooth 2.1 with Enhanced Data Rate and A2DP
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
OS: Windows Mobile 6.5 Professional; Wi-Fi: IEEE 802.11 b/g;  3.5 mm audio jack; Stereo FM radio with RDS, MP3/AAC+/WAV/WMA9 player; WMV, ASF, MP4, 3GP, 3G2, M4V, AVI player; microSD memory card
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 340 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: HTC T7373 Touch Pro 2 Unlocked Quad-Band GSM Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, Bluetooth, GPS and Wi-Fi - International Version - Mocha
